languages.text: {n}Бледная девушка держится с достоинством, не решаясь спорить или молить о пощаде. Она безропотно сдает оружие и позволяет себя увести, перед этим что-то шепнув на ухо помрачневшему Кляйну.{/n}

{n}Jinevri stands with dignity, neither arguing nor begging for mercy. She surrenders her weapon and allows herself to be led away. Klein watches her with a gloomy expression, and as she passes him, you notice her whisper something in his ear.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Бледная девушка держится с достоинством, не решаясь спорить или молить о пощаде. Она безропотно сдает оружие и позволяет себя увести, перед этим что-то шепнув на ухо помрачневшему Кляйну.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The pale young woman stands with dignity, not daring to argue or beg for mercy. She surrenders her weapon and allows herself to be led away, whispering something in the ear of a gloomy Klein before she does so.{/n}

{n}The pale young woman stands with dignity, not daring to argue or beg for mercy. She surrenders her weapon and allows herself to be led away, whispering something in the ear of a gloomy Klein before she does so.{/n}

{n}The pale young woman stands with dignity, neither arguing nor begging for mercy. She surrenders her weapon and allows herself to be led away, but before she does so, you see her whispering something in the ear of a gloomy Klein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jinevri wahrt ihre Würde, ohne sich zu rechtfertigen oder um Gnade zu flehen. Sie gibt ihre Waffen ab und lässt sich widerstandslos abführen. Klein beobachtet sie mit trauriger Miene und du bemerkst, dass sie ihm im Vorbeigehen etwas ins Ohr flüstert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri stands with dignity, neither arguing nor begging for mercy. She surrenders her weapon and allows herself to be led away. Klein watches her with a gloomy expression, and as she passes him, you notice her whisper something in his ear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jinevri wahrt ihre Würde, ohne sich zu rechtfertigen oder um Gnade zu flehen. Sie gibt ihre Waffen ab und lässt sich widerstandslos abführen. Klein beobachtet sie mit trauriger Miene und du bemerkst, dass sie ihm im Vorbeigehen etwas ins Ohr flüstert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jinevri, visiblement décidée à rester digne, ne s'abaisse ni à contester ni à implorer pitié. Elle tend son arme sans protester et se laisse escorter. Klein l'observe d'un œil sombre, et, au moment où elle passe devant lui, vous la remarquez qui lui murmure quelque chose à l'oreille.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri stands with dignity, neither arguing nor begging for mercy. She surrenders her weapon and allows herself to be led away. Klein watches her with a gloomy expression, and as she passes him, you notice her whisper something in his ear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jinevri, visiblement décidée à rester digne, ne s'abaisse ni à contester ni à implorer pitié. Elle tend son arme sans protester et se laisse escorter. Klein l'observe d'un œil sombre, et, au moment où elle passe devant lui, vous la remarquez qui lui murmure quelque chose à l'oreille.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jinevri mantiene una postura de dignidad, sin protestar ni suplicar clemencia. Entrega su arma y se deja llevar sin oponer resistencia. Klein la observa con expresión lúgubre, y cuando pasa a su lado, ves que ella le susurra algo al oído.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri stands with dignity, neither arguing nor begging for mercy. She surrenders her weapon and allows herself to be led away. Klein watches her with a gloomy expression, and as she passes him, you notice her whisper something in his ear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jinevri mantiene una postura de dignidad, sin protestar ni suplicar clemencia. Entrega su arma y se deja llevar sin oponer resistencia. Klein la observa con expresión lúgubre, y cuando pasa a su lado, ves que ella le susurra algo al oído.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジネヴリは堂々と立ち、反論をすることも慈悲を乞うこともしない。彼女は武器を手放し、連行されることも厭わない。クラインは憂鬱気な表情で彼女を見守っており、すれ違いざまに何かを耳元で囁いたことにあなたは気づいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri stands with dignity, neither arguing nor begging for mercy. She surrenders her weapon and allows herself to be led away. Klein watches her with a gloomy expression, and as she passes him, you notice her whisper something in his ear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジネヴリは堂々と立ち、反論をすることも慈悲を乞うこともしない。彼女は武器を手放し、連行されることも厭わない。クラインは憂鬱気な表情で彼女を見守っており、すれ違いざまに何かを耳元で囁いたことにあなたは気づいた。{/n}

languages.text: {n}杰尼娃带着尊严站在原地，既不争辩，也没有求饶。她交出了自己的武器，跟着执法者走了。克莱因以阴郁的表情看着她，当她经过克莱因身边时，你注意到，她在他耳边低声说了什么。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri stands with dignity, neither arguing nor begging for mercy. She surrenders her weapon and allows herself to be led away. Klein watches her with a gloomy expression, and as she passes him, you notice her whisper something in his ear.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}杰尼娃带着尊严站在原地，既不争辩，也没有求饶。她交出了自己的武器，跟着执法者走了。克莱因以阴郁的表情看着她，当她经过克莱因身边时，你注意到，她在他耳边低声说了什么。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jinevri, tüm asaletiyle dikiliyor. Ne karşı çıkıyor ne de merhamet için yalvarıyor. Silahını teslim ediyor. Götürülmeye itiraz etmiyor. Klein, kasvetli bir ifadeyle onu izliyor. Yanından geçerken Klein'in kulağına bir şey fısıldadığını fark ediyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jinevri stands with dignity, neither arguing nor begging for mercy. She surrenders her weapon and allows herself to be led away. Klein watches her with a gloomy expression, and as she passes him, you notice her whisper something in his ear.{/n}
